The protocol for the URL, such as "http" or "https".
Docs.summary: Generates a URL with an absolute path for an action method, which contains the specified name, name, route , and to use. See the remarks section for important security information.

remarks.para: This method uses the value of to populate the host section of the generated URI. Relying on the value of the current request can allow untrusted input to influence the resulting URI unless the Host header has been validated. See the deployment documentation for instructions on how to properly validate the Host header in your deployment environment.
